9.26.18  3:29 pm   Ok, so you are obviously a really good drummer, judging from your crazy accurate air-drumming, but we don't really get to enjoy  the full extent of your talents. Do something about it tomorrow. Or are you chicken? Gwaaap wak wak gwak gwak. ?
9.26.18  3:12 pm   Lesbianism, when?

9.26.18  2:36 pm   another happy person winning the first hour

For the past couple years, I've been starting the day on medicine, and I have to wait an hour before eating, and I've mostly been pissing away that time feeling gross and uncomfortable and telling myself I can't focus enough to be productive. Essentially losing the first hour.

But I got frustrated enough I said fuck it no excuses and followed your advice and I got so much done. It didn't even hurt, so it almost feels like it doesn't count because I've trained myself to view effort as painful, but whatever I'll take it and keep doing this and reprogram myself probably. Anyway, thank you so, so much. I didn't think I could do it, but I did it, and I feel amazing, and my life is going to be much better now.
